attributes.action: Allow ILE holders to apply for enlistment in the British Army
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The sons and daughters of Gurkhas who have got the ILE should be allowed to apply for enlistment in the British Army. As children of a British Army, they have every right to continue the service.Even the BNO holders are allowed to do so. So, there is apparently no reason why they shouldn't be allowed to serve in this Army.
